name: Bazooka Caverns
description:
In Bazooka Caverns, bombs are powered by health. Blast your way to the bottom of the caverns and destroy the nest without using up all your health! Bigger bombs consume more health and are more destructive, while smaller bombs consume less health and are bouncier.  Aim for the gold scorpions to regain some health but beware the purple scorpions! Can you make it to the end?

Controls:

  • Mouse to aim
  • Left click to shoot
  • Scroll wheel or W/S to change bomb size

Created by Robbie Goldberg and Robert Jones

We hope you have fun!

Made in 72 hours for Mini Jam 109 - Depth(s)
